snippet.title: Aavan Jaavan Song Teaser | WAR 2 | Hrithik Roshan, Kiara | Pritam, Arijit Singh, Nikhita | Amitabh B
snippet.description:
When love is effortless, it feels like a dream… get ready to groove on #AavanJaavan 🎶 🤍 Song out tomorrow!
#War2 releasing in Hindi, Telugu & Tamil on August 14th in cinemas worldwide!

► Subscribe Now: https://goo.gl/xs3mrY 🔔 Stay updated!
► YRF New Releases - https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLCB05E03DA939D484

🎧 Song Credits:
Music: Pritam
Lyrics: Amitabh Bhattacharya
Singers: Arijit Singh, Nikhita Gandhi
Director of Choreography: Bosco Leslie Martis
Recording Studio: YRF Studios

Stay in the filmy loop:
► Like us on Facebook: Facebook/yrf 
► Follow us on X: x.com/yrf
► Follow us on Instagram: Instagram/yrf
► Visit us on: yashrajfilms.com

🎬 MOVIE CREDITS:
Movie: WAR 2
Starring: Hrithik Roshan, NTR, Kiara Advani
Director: Ayan Mukerji
Producer: Aditya Chopra
Co-Producer: Akshaye Widhani
Screenplay: Shridhar Raghavan
Director of Photography: Benjamin Jasper ACS 
Music: Pritam
Lyrics: Amitabh Bhattacharya
Dialogues: Abbas Tyrewala
Story: Aditya Chopra
Associate Producer: Rishabh Chopra
Executive Producer: Sanjay Shivalkar
Editor: Aarif Sheikh
Production Designers: Rajat Poddar, Amrita Mahal Nakai
Sound: Dileep Subramaniam, Ganesh Gangadharan
Background Music: Sanchit Balhara, Ankit Balhara
Action Directors: Spiro Razatos, Franz Spilhaus, Anl Arasu, Oh Sea Young, Craig Macrae, Sunil Rodrigues [ROD]
Costume Designers: Anaita Shroff Adajania, Niharika Jolly
Director of Choreography: Bosco Leslie Martis
Visual Effects Studio: yFX
Casting Director: Shanoo Sharma
Supervising Producer: Gurpreet Singh
Trailers & Promos: Mohit Sajnaney
Release Date: 14 August 2025

About YRF Spy Universe:
YRF Spy Universe is a first of its kind cinematic universe of spy thriller films in India. The first film in the universe, "Ek Tha Tiger", starring Salman Khan and Katrina Kaif was released in 2012, followed by its sequel "Tiger Zinda Hai" in 2017. The third film in the universe, "War" was released in 2019 and starred Hrithik Roshan and Tiger Shroff in pivotal roles. "Pathaan" was the fourth instalment in the Spy Universe franchise which was released in 2023 starring Shah Rukh Khan, Deepika Padukone and John Abraham. "Tiger 3", the fifth instalment in the YRF Spy Universe and the third film in the Tiger series, starring Salman Khan, Katrina Kaif and Emraan Hashmi, released in 2023. "War 2" is the sixth film of the YRF Spy Universe franchise and will release on 14 August 2025. The film stars two of the greatest cinematic icons Hrithik Roshan and NTR, with Kiara Advani in the lead and is directed by Ayan Mukerji. “Alpha”, the seventh instalment in the franchise and Hindi cinema's first female-led YRF Spy Universe film, starring Alia Bhatt and Sharvari, is set to release on 25 December 2025.

#yrfnewreleases #yrf #yashraj #yashrajfilms #yrfmovies #yrfmusic #adityachopra #hrithikroshan #ntr #kiaraadvani #ayanmukerji #pritam #amitabhbhattacharya #arijitsingh #nikhitagandhi #newsong #bollywoodsongs #newsong2025 #romanticsong #songteaser #bollywoodlovesong

© Yash Raj Films Pvt. Ltd.

snippet.title: Avatar: Fire and Ash | Official Trailer
snippet.description:
From Director James Cameron, watch the trailer for Avatar: Fire and Ash.
Experience the film only in theaters December 19.

With “Avatar: Fire and Ash,” James Cameron takes audiences back to Pandora in an immersive new adventure with Marine turned Na’vi leader Jake Sully (Sam Worthington), Na’vi warrior Neytiri (Zoe Saldaña), and the Sully family. The film, which has a screenplay by James Cameron & Rick Jaffa & Amanda Silver, and a story by James Cameron & Rick Jaffa & Amanda Silver & Josh Friedman & Shane Salerno, also stars Sigourney Weaver, Stephen Lang, Oona Chaplin, Cliff Curtis, Britain Dalton, Trinity Bliss, Jack Champion, Bailey Bass and Kate Winslet.

——
ABOUT AVATAR
Director: James Cameron
Cast: Sam Worthington, Zoe Saldaña, Sigourney Weaver, Stephen Lang
Films: Avatar & Avatar: The Way of Water 

Visit our website: https://www.avatar.com/  
Follow Avatar on Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/avatar/ 
Follow Avatar on TikTok: https://www.tiktok.com/@avatar  
Like Avatar on Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/Avatar/  
Follow Avatar on X: https://twitter.com/officialavatar  

#Avatar #AvatarFireandAsh

snippet.title: Pardesiya - Param Sundari | Sidharth M, Janhvi K | Sachin-Jigar, Sonu Nigam, Krishnakali, Amitabh B
snippet.description:
Breathe it. Feel it. Live it! Pardesiya....let love take over your heart! 💞 

The biggest love song of the year #Pardesiya, song out now!

🎧 Listen Now On:

➟ Spotify: https://open.spotify.com/track/0q84FggW57NXGtLHoetS0Y?si=69de460ee14e4e86
➟ YouTube Music: https://music.youtube.com/watch?v=kMyTKHEJ-6c&si=mSgpKVQSlFYVarcG
➟ Apple Music: https://music.apple.com/in/song/pardesiya-from-param-sundari/1829701947
➟ Amazon Music: https://music.amazon.com/tracks/B0FKBYPVWX?marketplaceId=A3K6Y4MI8GDYMT&musicTerritory=IN&ref=dm_sh_itcKlOS1hQjmeCl5whC70Vcmn 

🎬 Create your version of #Pardesiya on:
➟ YouTube Shorts: https://youtube.com/source/kMyTKHEJ-6c/shorts?feature=shared
➟ Instagram Reels: https://www.instagram.com/reels/audio/1097832552230653?igsh=MTV5M3pkaHB2MjJmNg

#ParamSundari releasing in cinemas worldwide on 29th August 2025.

🎧 Song Credits :

🎶 Music : Sachin-Jigar 
🎤 Singer : Sonu Nigam  Krishnakali Saha & Sachin-Jigar
➟ Lyrics : Amitabh Bhattacharya 
➟ Programmed & Arranged : Sachin - Jigar
➟ Additional Programming- Sahil Vishwakarma (White Noise Collectives) 
➟ Music Production Head : Romil Ved
➟ Guitars : Sahil Vishwakarma
➟ Flutes : Naveen Kumar 
➟ Backing Vocals - Anandi-Aheeri, Sahil
➟ Recording Engineer : Swar Mehta (White Noise Collectives)
➟ Mixed & Mastered : Eric Pillai @ FSOB
➟ Assistant mix Engineer - Michael Edwin Pillai

🎬 Video Credits

Maddock Films presents #ParamSundari In cinemas on 29th August 2025

➟ Cast: Sidharth Malhotra and Janhvi Kapoor 
➟ Produced By: Dinesh Vijan
➟ Directed By: Tushar Jalota
➟ Co-Producers: Sharada Karki Jalota & Poonam Shivdasani
➟ Director Of Photography : Santhanakrishnan
➟ Story by: Gaurav Mishra, Aarsh Vora, Tushar Jalota
➟ Screenplay and Dialogues: Aarsh Vora, Tushar Jalota
➟ Music By: Sachin-Jigar
➟ Background Score: Sachin-Jigar
➟ Lyrics: Amitabh Bhattacharya 
➟ Additional Dialogues: Gaurav Mishra
➟ Costume Designer : Sheetal Iqbal Sharma
➟ Director Of Choreography: Brinda Gopal
➟ Publicity Design: Himanshu & Rahul Nanda (H-One)

Lyrics:

Pardesiya..
Hai tere pyar mein jab se
Jhankaar si..
Hai dil ke taar mein tab se

Tum ho mere jaanta hun magar
Pohchaauñ tum tak ye kaise khabar

Kab se hun main ummeed meiñ
Hai ankaha jo sun lo agar

Pardesiya..
Mila hai tu mujhe jab se

Maiñ qaid huñ
Tere bhi pyar mein tab se ..

Pardesiya haiñ teri batiyoñ ne 
Kiya pareshan pardesiya..

Pardesiya haiñ teri ankhiyoñ ke
Dil pe nishaan pardesiya..
 
Chhoo ke laboñ se jaise
Jaadu hi kar diya
Saavan ne morni ko
Qaabu mein kar liya

Hum dono ki juda theeñ hastiyaañ
Hoñ kinara bin jaise kashtiyaañ

Aasaan ho aage safar
Tum saath mera chun lo agar

Pardesiya.. 

#SonuNigam #SidharthMalhotra #JanhviKapoor 

© 2025 Universal Music India Pvt. Ltd., Under Exclusive License from Maddock Films Pvt. Ltd

snippet.title: KINGDOM Official Trailer | Vijay Deverakonda, Satya Dev, Bhagyashrii | Anirudh | Gowtam Tinnanuri
snippet.description:
#KINGDOM ~ Starring Vijay Deverakonda in Lead Role. Directed by Gowtam Tinnanuri. Music by Anirudh Ravichander. Editing by Navin Nooli. Produced by Naga Vamsi S & Sai Soujanya Under Sithara Entertainments & Fortune 4 Cinemas Banner. Presented by Srikara Studios.

#Kingdom will roar in theatres Worldwide on July 31st! 👊🏾

Movie Name: Kingdom
Cast: Vijay Devarakonda, Satya Dev & Bhagyashrii Borse

CREW DETAILS:

Written & Directed By: Gowtam Tinnanuri 
Produced By: Naga Vamsi S – Sai Soujanya 
Music Composed By: Anirudh
Cinematographer’s: Jomon T John ISC & Girish Gangadharan ISC
Editor: Navin Nooli 
Production Designer: Avinash Kolla
Costume Designer: Neeraja Kona
Lyrics: Krishna Kanth
Song Choreographer: Vijay Binni
Action Choreographer’s: Yannick Ben,  Chethan D’Souza &  Real Satish
Colorist: Ranga 
Sound Design: Sync Cinema
Audiography: Vinay Sridhar
VFX Supervisor:  Vasudeva Rao M 
Co – Director: Sri Vastav 
Production Team: Girish Dasika & Uma Mahesh Karumanchi 

Chief Associate Director: Basheer
Associate Directors: B.V. Raveendra, Tirumala Reddy Akki, Muthyam Vijay Kumar,  Mahesh Talluri, Nallandula Jagadeesh, Vihari Mungamuri & Geetha Sapuru. 
Assistant Directors: Parth Bane, Akhil Raj,  Shrikaran Beecharaju & Manoj Rishie
Online Editor: Santosh Kiran 
Chief Associate Editors: Srinu Bainaboyina 
Associate Editors: Srinivas Nadiminti  & Vishnu Ramagiri 
Assistant Ediotrs: Thallapelli Pavan Gowd
Still Photography: Prem

in Association with Fortune Four Studios
